select reserve_apply_car_number as "reserve_apply_car_number" ,to_char(reservation_date,'yyyy-mm-dd AM HH:MI:SS') as "reservetion_date" ,start_point_longitude as "start_point_longitude" ,start_point_latitude as "start_point_latitude" ,end_point_longitude as "end_point_longitude" ,end_point_latitude as "end_point_latitude" ,car_number as "car_number" ,driver_no as "driver_no" ,user_no as "user_no" ,reserve_count as "reserve_count" ,start_road_addr as "start_road_addr" ,start_detail_addr as "start_detail_addr" ,end_road_addr as "end_road_addr" ,end_detail_addr as "end_derail_addr" ,reserve_status_code as "reserve_status_code" ,to_char(drive_start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd AM HH:MI:SS') as "drive_start_time" ,to_char(drive_finish_time,'yyyy-mm-dd AM HH:MI:SS') as "drive_finish_time" ,drive_distance as "drive_distance" from reserve_apply_car order by reserve_apply_car_number asc
select count(reserve_apply_car_number) from RESERVE_APPLY_CAR where to_char(reservation_date,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')=#{reservedate} and reserve_status_code='1'

select count(reserve_count) as "reserveCntZero" from RESERVE_APPLY_CAR where reserve_count=0 and reserve_status_code='1' and RESERVE_APPLY_CAR_NUMBER=#{select_num}
